definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
coaxial circular arc/concentric arc (in spherical geometry)
arc length/length of a curve segment
arc length (the length of a curve segment)
parametrization by arc length (of a space curve)

sentences.english: Scientists believe it is a main source of the G ring and its single ring arc.
sentences.chinese: 科学家认为，它是一个主要来源国和它的单环环弧。

sentences.english: It is impossible to pide a given common angle or arc(instead of the particular angles or arcs)into three equal parts by using a rule and compasses.
sentences.chinese: 用尺规将一个任意角或弧绝对准确三等分是不可能的。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new type of control circuit of SAW.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型的埋弧自动焊接机的控制电路。

sentences.english: The electric insulation Of micro-arc oxidation ceramic on a real hard-aluminium is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了商用硬铝经微弧氧化后的电绝缘性能。

sentences.english: Pure Fe nanopowders were prepared successfully by method of anodic arc discharging plasma.
sentences.chinese: 采用阳极弧放电等离子体制备了高纯铁纳米粉末。

sentences.english: The operation of bubbly slag submerged - arc is a new technology of electric arc furnace smelt.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫渣埋弧操作是电弧炉炼钢的一项新技术。

sentences.english: Lightning arcs from the top of a cloud to the horizon off the coast of the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 来自云端的闪电弧击中巴哈马海岸外的地平线。

sentences.english: Discussion is based on the fact that the shortest arc on surface is geodesic.
sentences.chinese: 应用“曲面上最短弧为测地线”的事实进行了讨论。

sentences.english: This paper presented a least-square orthogonal distance fitting method for double concentric fragmental ellipses.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种带有同心条件的双椭圆弧拟合方法。

sentences.english: Simultaneously, the invention also discloses an installing method and a special tool for the dynamic arc contact.
sentences.chinese: 同时还公开了一种该动弧触头的安装方法和专用工装。

sentences.english: The arc of the southern Milky Way shone brightly on this starry night.
sentences.chinese: 在这繁星闪耀的夜晚，南天银河弧明亮发光。

sentences.english: The characteristics of trace elements are similar to that of island-arc granites (IAG).
sentences.chinese: 痕量元素特征与典型的火山弧花岗岩相似。

sentences.english: Stage 3, early Pleistocene, anticlockwise rotation of Luzon arc and continent-arc collision.
sentences.chinese: 更新世，吕宋弧逆时针转动和弧陆碰撞阶段。

sentences.english: The connecting lines are arcs, and the points within the Cartesian coordinate system are nodes.
sentences.chinese: 连接线称为弧，笛卡尔坐标系统中的点称为节点。

sentences.english: Operating with short arc and narrow welding run when welding.
sentences.chinese: 焊接时须用短弧操作并以窄焊道为宜。

sentences.english: We manoeuvred our cars around the Arc and parked in position.
sentences.chinese: 我们周围的弧的机动车辆停放位置和。

definition: be high up in the sky
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
